Title: Lakshya
Writer: Javed Akhtar (dialogue), Javed Akhtar (screenplay), Javed Akhtar (story), Karan Kashyap (dialogue supervisor)
Actors: Amitabh Bachchan, Hrithik Roshan, Preity Zinta, Om Puri
Plot: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.
